news.details:
Thank you for playing Trombone Champ: Unflattened! We have a bunch of changes coming soon:

- Tons of bug fixes!
- Trombone calibration.
- Support for more languages.
- Improvements to visuals and performance.
- Improved mixed reality (on platforms that support it).
- New songs and environments.

Find our full roadmap on <u>TC.FLAT2VRSTUDIOS.COM</u>
